item.title: Unlimited Money & XP Booster v4.4 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 25, 2025

Unlimited Money & XP Booster v4.4 ETS2

This latest version (V4.4) brings even more balance and efficiency compared to previous releases! Now, you can enjoy an improved money and XP boost system, ensuring a seamless progression in Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) 1.53.

What’s New in V4.4?
More optimized XP & money rewards for better gameplay balance.
Instant high-level boost after your first delivery.
Refined mechanics to ensure smooth activation and progression.
Fully compatible with ETS2 version 1.53.

Get rich and level up faster than ever! Once you’ve reached your desired XP and cash, you can remove the mod if needed. Enjoy the road with unlimited possibilities!

Credits: Abdo Ibn Egypt

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Abdo-African Arabs V6.1 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 25, 2025

Abdo-African Arabs V6.1 ETS2

The latest and most refined version of the Abdo-African Arabs Map! This update (V6.1) offers enhanced stability, improved road networks, and a more immersive experience across Morocco, Algeria, and Tunisia.

What’s New in V6.1?
More optimized cities & road connections for a smoother journey.
Bug fixes and refinements from previous versions.
Improved performance and compatibility for better gameplay.
Standalone Map – No additional map mods required!

This version is protected against previous releases, ensuring better stability and performance. Get ready for a true North African adventure in Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) 1.53!

Credits: Abdo Ibn Egypt

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Police Tweaks v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 25, 2025

Police Tweaks v1.0 ETS2

Tweaks police fines and probability
Most fine chances for when there is no cop around removed or lowered. No more double fines if a cop spots you.

With no cop around, there is no chance of a fine for:
– Driving without lights
– Passing a red light
– Speeding (without a speed camera)

And lowered chances for:
– Driving the wrong way (40% down from 60% – if no cop is around, someone may still call emergency)
– Speeding past a speed camera (90% instead of 100%)

In addition to this the time before the first speeding fine is increased, giving you a chance to slow down, and the time between sleep avoiding fines is increased.

The fine for car crashes is set to a much lower amount, about one quarter of default, as most crashes are caused by the AI. You still get the message but no longer have to pay the full fine as well as deal with any damage to your truck.

Credits: Erbkaiser

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Actual Day-/Night times v1.53.1 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | February 25, 2025

Actual Day-/Night times v1.53.1 ETS2

This mod changes the day/night cycle to real world times. This affects the time the sun will rise or set.

It works by changing the defined day from midsummer to the Wednesday of the current week. So in winter you will have long nights and short days, and in summer the reverse.

Should be compatible* with every other mod, just make sure to place this one above (higher priority than) any graphics, map, or weather mods.
As long as the mod places roads and cities where they are supposed to be on the map sun times will be automatically correctly applied for where you’re driving.

Tested for 1.53

Credits: Erbkaiser

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
